products.title: Utopia Charcoal Roller Blind
products.description: If you thought youd seen all of the grey blinds, you be wrong. This utopia charcoal roller blind is like no other. Its sleek, but with a look of sweet texture, dark but with a whole lot of warmth. products.title: Utopia Slate Grey Roller Blind
products.description: There's little more on-trend than grey at the moment if you're looking to modernise your home, and this utopia slate grey is the perfect example. Boldly dark, the fabric is plain and straightforward for an elegant, minimalist look.
